CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Market relative to Ironwood Market?
SRP.A: Aether Market is {below} Ironwood Market in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Emporium relative to Aether Market?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Emporium is {below} Aether Market in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Exchange relative to Silverleaf Emporium?
SRP.A: Nova Exchange is {above} Silverleaf Emporium in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Exchange}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverleaf Emporium's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverleaf Emporium's maximum Price Index is in {1975}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's maximum Price Index is in {1969}.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1969, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1962 and 1964?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1958 and 1969 was {higher} than between 1962 and 1964.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1963 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total price index in 1963 was {higher} than in 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1969 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total price index in 1969 was {lower} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1970, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1964?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1963 and 1970 was {larger} than between 1963 and 1964.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Exchange} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Nova Exchange and Ironwood Market first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Nova Exchange and Ironwood Market did not exchange leading positions.
